info.title: Char AI API
info.description: AI services API for speech-to-text transcription, LLM chat completions, and subscription management

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description:
STT provider. Use 'hyprnote' for automatic routing (default), or specify:
deepgram, soniox, assemblyai, gladia, elevenlabs, fireworks, openai, dashscope, mistral

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Model to use for transcription (provider-specific, e.g. 'nova-3')

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: BCP-47 language hint (e.g. 'en', 'ko', 'ja'). Multiple values or comma-separated supported

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keyword boosting. Comma-separated or repeated query params

parameters.name: encoding
parameters.description: Audio encoding: linear16, flac, mulaw, opus, ogg-opus, etc.

101.description: WebSocket upgrade. Server sends StreamResponse JSON messages.

400.description: Bad request (invalid provider, missing params, etc.)

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description:
STT provider. Use 'hyprnote' for automatic routing (default), or specify:
deepgram, soniox, assemblyai, gladia, elevenlabs, fireworks, openai, dashscope, mistral

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Model to use for transcription (provider-specific, e.g. 'nova-3')

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: BCP-47 language hint (e.g. 'en', 'ko', 'ja'). Multiple values or comma-separated supported

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keyword boosting. Comma-separated or repeated query params

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: When set, enables async callback mode. Body should be JSON with a `url` field instead of raw audio

requestBody.description: Raw audio bytes (sync mode) or JSON `{ "url": "<file_id>" }` (callback mode)

400.description: Bad request (empty body, invalid provider, etc.)
